title: Can we run a WiFi and a Bluetooth adapter together in a PC? - Quora

response.answer_text: We can, considering that I do it all the time. Modern computers, especially notebooks come equipped with both a WiFi and a Bluetooth adapter built in. You can enable them at the same time and enjoy your connectivity options. I recently discovered that a nifty little piece of software enables my laptop to become closely integrated with my smartphone so that I can control notifications, messages, calls, photos and music on my device from my notebook. For it to function, I should enable both my WiFi and Bluetooth. It works, and the result is bliss.
